programme.title: Plean Bee
programme.desc: Léargas ar an meath atá tagtha ar líon na mbeach agus na bpailneoirí in Éirinn agus i dtíortha eile le blianta anuas. (A look at the decline in bees and pollinators.)

programme.title: Keeping Faith
programme.desc: Baineann scéala áirithe stangadh as Faith agus í i mbun cás Madlen. (Faith reveals worrying news as she continues to explore Madlen's case.)

programme.title: Wwoofáil
programme.desc: Rachaidh Mairéad & Conall ar a gcéad turas le Wwoof i Sligeach. (Novice Wwoofers Mairéad and Conall set off on their first Wwoofing adventure in County Sligo.)

programme.title: An Gobán Saor
programme.desc: Sraith a dhéanann ceiliúradh ar an ngreann i saol na hÉireann. (Irishmen of a certain vintage and from all walks of life tell their favourite stories.)

programme.title: Nuacht TG4
programme.desc: Mórimeachtaí an lae ó Aonad Nuachta TG4. (The day's main news stories from a regional, national and international perspective.)

programme.title: Ollchlár Ros na Rún
programme.desc: Cuireann Réailtín de chúram uirthi féin an ruaig a chur ar Chaitríona as an teach. (Réailtín takes matters into her own hands, and manages to evict Caitríona from the house.)

programme.title: Féile Ealaíne na hEaragaile
programme.desc: An tseachtain seo tabharfaidh an banna 'Honeyfeet' aghaidh ar an bpríomhstáitse. (This week features Honeyfeet, Steve Cooney, Maggie Carty, Máirtín Staunton and Jack Warnock.)

programme.title: Laochra Gael
programme.desc: Leanfaidh an 21ú sraith de Laochra Gael le scéal an imreora camógaíochta as Cill Chainnigh, Anne Dalton. (The 21st series of Laochra Gael follows the story of Anne Dalton.)

programme.title: France 24
programme.desc: Cainéal nuachta 24 uair an chloig na Fraince atá i France 24. (FRANCE 24 is France's 24 hour international news channel.)

programme.title: Garfield
programme.desc: Tá uirlis nua ag an Dochtúir Tomhais. (Dr. Puzzle has invented an ingenious device to trade two people's personalities!)

programme.title: That's Joey
programme.desc: Tugann Olive a dialann ar scoil trí thimpiste. (Olive realises she brought her diary to school by mistake.)

programme.title: That's Joey
programme.desc: Nuair a éiríonn an comharsa béal dorais an-chrosta leo, caithfidh Joey agus Yassine é a chur ar a shuaimhneas. (Joey and Yassine set out to help Joey's neighbour Billy relax.)

programme.title: Pat an Madra
programme.desc: Ní thaitníonn le Pat ná le Victor cuairt a thabhairt ar an tréidlia. (Neither Pat or Victor enjoy going to the veterinary clinic.)

programme.title: Pat an Madra
programme.desc: Tá Hoodie ag imirt cleas ar dhaoine timpeall na cathrach, i ngan fhios dó féin. (Hoodie is fooling people in the city unknown to himself, as they fear a panther is loose.)

programme.desc: Bíonn fadhb ollmhór i gCathair an Bhogha Ceatha nuair a thosaíonn na Cúntóirí Beaga ag cabhrú an iomarca! (Rainbow city has a huge problem when all the little helpers try helping.)

programme.title: Clifford
programme.desc: Téann Clifford agus Emily Eilís ag spaisteoireacht chun an míol mór bán a aimsiú. (Clifford and Emily Elizabeth go on an adventure to find the white whale.)

programme.title: Deer Squad
programme.desc: Dúisítear páistí Ian agus cuireann sé an milleann ar Lola. (Ian gets furious and blames Lola for waking his babies.)

programme.title: Dinocity
programme.desc: Tá Mam ag iarraidh go mbeidh saol nua, folláin aici. (Mom wants a new, healthy lifestyle.)

programme.title: Daisy & Ollie
programme.desc: Faigheann Daisy agus Ollie amach an tábhacht a bhaineann le bheith glan. (Daisy and Ollie discover why it is important to keep clean, having lots of fun in the process.)

programme.title: Dee Dee
programme.desc: Tá cóisir mhór eagraithe ag an Méara don lá inniu, meas tú an mbeidh an bia ar fad réitithe ag Tiggy? (The Mayor has organised a big party but will Tiggy have all the food prepped?)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Téann carr na gcoileán as smacht. (The Wolfies' car goes out of control, driving itself, and creating problems in the city.)

programme.title: Béiriní is a Leabhair
programme.desc: Foghlaimíonn Gobnait go mbíonn sé deacair ainmhithe a fheiceáil nuair a bhíonn duaithníocht acu. (Gobnait learns that it is harder to find animals when they blend into their environment.)

programme.title: Rita & Crogall
programme.desc: Téann Rita agus Crogall ag campáil. (Rita and Crocodile go camping.)

programme.title: Rita & Crogall
programme.desc: Téann Rita agus Crogall chuig an zú agus casann Crogall le cairde nua. (Rita and Crocodile go to the zoo and Crocodile makes some new friends.)

programme.title: Pip & Posy
programme.desc: Meas tú cén fáth a bhfuil an méid sin plástair ag teastáil ó Loscán? (Why does Froggy need so many "plasters"?)

programme.title: Digley & Dazey
programme.desc: Caithfidh ár gcairde cúrsa nua gailf a thógáil. (The crew has to build a crazy golf course! They finish the bizarre thing in no time, and Digley tries it out.)

programme.title: Digley & Dazey
programme.desc: Caithfidh ár gcairde oibriú as lámha a chéile le tine a mhúchadh. (The crew is just about to start the day when a fire alarm goes off!)

programme.title: Ainmhithe Craiceáilte
programme.desc: Ar chlár an lae inniu beidh madra ag luascadh agus pearóid nach bhfuil sásta a chuid brocailí a ithe. (Today a bulldog attempts to go for a swim.)

programme.title: The Wonder Years
programme.desc: Cuireann Winnie ina luí ar Kevin í a thabhairt chuig ceolchoirm The Rolling Stones. (When they hear that The Rolling Stones are coming to town, Winnie convinces Kevin to take her.)

programme.title: The Golden Girls

programme.title: A Chef's Life

programme.desc: Tá mac léinn ollscoile ag súil go ndéanfaidh na siorcanna infheistíocht ina ghnó. (A college student who earned a perfect SAT score wants to expand his business.)

programme.desc: I ndiaidh sos gearr, tá an tsraith iomráiteach ealaíon IMEALL ar ais ar TG4. (TG4's award-winning flagship bilingual arts series, Imeall, is back.)

programme.title: 7 Lá
programme.desc: Clár cúrsaí reatha seachtainiúil TG4. (Politics and the economy, regional, national and international affairs.)

programme.title: Ros na Rún
programme.desc: Bíonn Sonia idir dhá chomhairle faoina caidreamh le Mack mar gheall ar an gcaoi ar chaith sé léi féin agus le Sam. (When Mack overreacts with Sonia questions their relationship.)

programme.title: Viva Ceol Tíre
programme.desc: Clár ceoil tíre á chur i láthair ag Jo Ní Chéide. (Jo Ní Chéide showcases country music videos filmed on location here in Ireland.)

programme.title: Glór Tíre
programme.desc: An babhta leathcheannais beo de Glór Tíre 2023. (The live semi final of Glór Tíre 2023. Presented by Aoife Ní Thuairisg & Séamus Ó Scanláin.)

programme.title: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Bhí an domhan mór ag faire ar Michael Jordan sa bhliain 1993. (In 1993 it all felt like it came to a head with the Chicago Bulls' pursuit of a third straight title.)
